alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Daniels, northeastern Roosevelt and northwestern Sheridan Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 714 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm near Archer, or 7 miles west of Plentywood, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public report received via social media of estimated pea- size hail 6 miles west of Plentywood. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Redstone, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Outlook, Raymond and Daleview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
